articles.author: Tom Collomosse
articles.title: Wales 0-1 Poland: Rob Page's side are RELEGATED from the Nations League top tier - Daily Mail
articles.description: TOM COLLOMOSSE IN CARDIFF: There was to be no joyful World Cup send-off for Wales as Karol Swiderski's goal meant Rob Page's team suffered relegation from Europe's top tier.
articles.content:
There was to be no joyful World Cup send-off for Wales as Karol Swiderskis second-half goal meant Rob Pages team joined England in suffering relegation from Europes top tier.
Wales will be alongside… [+5348 chars]

articles.title: Auger-Aliassime stuns Djokovic to help Team World win Laver Cup for 1st time - CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime added a singles victory over Novak Djokovic to an earlier doubles win Sunday to help Team World to victory over Team Europe in the Laver Cup.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jason Godfrey
articles.title: Holiday from hell in Romania: Cashless and living in four-day-old clothes - The Star Online
articles.description: You know you're getting old when you’re practically living on the streets of a small town in Europe and it’s not a big, fun adventure.
articles.content:
Currently, Im homeless in Suceava.
Im on a family trip to Romania, where my wife is from a little village out here, and within minutes of arriving at the farmhouse, our little boy was trembling from… [+4064 chars]

articles.title: Air traffic controllers in West, Central Africa suspend strike - Premium Times
articles.description: The strike disrupted flight schedules across the West and Central African regions, leaving hundreds of passengers travelling to Europe, the United States and within the continent stranded at airports till Saturday.
articles.content:
Air traffic controllers in some African countries have suspended their strike more than 24 hours after the industrial action commenced and grounded air travel.
